cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a great friggin car, there are a few problems with it, something I don't want to talk about.
Big, armored, you can run over everything with this joker.
Take a look at this like-new 2012 Smart fortwo with an automatic transmission! Who says you can't keep the fun in functionality? It's like a reverse mullet; party in the front, business in the back.
